clues.text: In 1990 Doug Drabek became the first Pittsburgh Pirate since Vern Law in 1960 to win this pitching award

Named for magazine publisher Hugo Gernsback, the Hugo Award honors this literary genre
The Obie Awards for off-Broadway theater are sponsored by this weekly New York paper

rounds.comments: (Alex: This is Math Awareness Month, and the National Council of Teachers of Mathematics have asked us to do something in honor of National Math Awareness Month, and that's why we've got that category.  We'll find out how well it plays in a few moments.)

clues.text: Term for a type of triangle with three equal sides

After multiplying these you should reduce the product if possible

rounds.text: Dialogue from this play: "He didn't say for sure he'd come."  "And if he doesn't come?"  "We'll come back tomorrow"
